true but sadly not in a while...

the user below me has seen 2010

True. I was 9 back then.

The user below me likes to kill Kerbals.

Nope. But i like to be excessively cruel to them.

The user below me has IQ higher than 110.

True, 122.

The user below me is a minimalist in rocket design.

Hell yeah. Efficiency for science and low part count for mental sanity.

The user below me believes The Flintstones depicts the true story about human evolution.

Nope. The user below you does know that the dinosaurs were extinct way before first humans appeared.

The user below me is not BadLeo.

False, I guess.

The user below me knows nothing, John Snow.

*insert answer here*

The user below me has insomnia.

What's that?

The user below me should go vegan and become a Christian.

No! I'll live and die an omnivorous atheist.

The user below me is also immune to

Never played Age of Empires...

The user below me has played Crusader Kings 2.

Nope.

the user below me likes Doctor Who.

Never saw a single episode. But I'm sympathetic to it and may watch someday.

The user below me likes football. I mean, the literal one.

Meh. I don't like any sports.

The user below me can dance.

I can. However, I hate to dance.

The user below me can pilot a jet in FSX.

Haven't played FSX yet. So false.

The user below me just ate a chocolate bar.

false although i am hungry

te user below me is eating food right now

Yep. Panda Express. Mmm...

The user below me dislikes the change to Curse.

Yes. Very much so

The user below me is human

Nope. I'm a horrifying Mudkip/Brony crossbreed.

false actually, i have tried to keep an open mind about this...

the user below has failed to keep an open mind about the Curse situation

False, I am neutral to it. I'll let my opinion form based on how it treats us.

The user below me has never used Curse before.

False. I have used it rather recently, and had to deal with a flood of malware.

The user below me is British.

False, I live in America and i was born in Indonesia but i love Doctor Who

the User below me loves doctor who and is open minded about the 12th doctor
